column2: A new version of the LankaSettle System Rules has been published by the Gazette Notification No. 2213/2 dated 01st February

column1: 2021, incorporating amendments up to 31st December 2020. It is published in the Central Bank Official Website and can be
Accordingly, all the Participants are hereby required to comply with the LankaSettle System Rules - Version 2.2.
